@description.name: @description
@description.body: Data-* attribute handling for DOM HTML elements. This feature set is supported cross-browser through one common interface and is independent of the differences between the multiple implementations.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets a data attribute on the given DOM element.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: element {Element} The DOM element to modify

@param.name: @param
@param.body: name {String} Name of the attribute [CamelCase variant]

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {var} New value of the attribute

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the value of the given HTML "data-*" attribute

@param.name: @param
@param.body: element {Element} The DOM element to query

@param.name: @param
@param.body: name {String} Name of the attribute [CamelCase variant]

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns a map containing all the HTML "data-*" attributes of the specified element

@param.name: @param
@param.body: element {Element} The DOM element to query

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Map} The map containing all the "data-*" attributes
@return.description: The map containing all the "data-*" attributes

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Checks if any element in the collection has a "data-*" attribute

@param.name: @param
@param.body: element {Element} The DOM Element to check the presence of data-* attributes on.
@param.description: The DOM Element to check the presence of data-* attributes on.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} True if any element in the collection has a "data-*" attribute
@return.description: True if any element in the collection has a "data-*" attribute

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Remove an HTML "data-*" attribute from the given DOM element

@param.name: @param
@param.body: element {Element} The DOM element to modify
